input.sentences: he was headed over to his friends house
[male] was telling him about a job in the city
the wife said it was a great idea
and they read some books at the end of the night
output.sentences: Tom headed to his friends house.
He always enjoyed listening to music with his male friend Jake.
However, today his male friend only nagged Tom and kept telling him to get a job.
Tom figured it was probably Jake's wife that gave him the idea to talk to him about work.
So to Tom's dismay, they spent the rest of the night reading self-help books to him.
